remains.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the parts of something that are left after the rest has been destroyed or has disappeared
remains.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: extensive Roman remains  (=of ancient buildings) at Arles
On the table were the remains of the evening meal.
remains.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the body of someone who has died
remains.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Her remains are buried in Westminster.
